Erie.WEHP: Happi 92.7 WEHP (92.7 FM) is an Adult Top 40 formatted radio station in Erie, Pennsylvania, licensed to Lawrence Park, Pennsylvania under the ownership of the Erie Radio Company. They use the moniker "Happi 92.7". The station signed on the air November 14, 2012 with a stunting of songs with the word "Happy" in it before unveiling the Top 40 format at 12:00pm on November 16, 2012.
